is.hello.go99.animators

Class AnimatorTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hello.go99.animators.AnimatorTemplate

  • public class AnimatorTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    Read-only class that encapsulates the attributes common to different animation classes in the Android SDK.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static AnimatorTemplate DEFAULT
      The global default animator template.
      long duration
      The duration of an animation.
      android.view.animation.Interpolator interpolator
      The interpolator of an animation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.view.animation.Animation apply(android.view.animation.Animation animation)
      Applies the attributes of the template to a given animation, returning that animation.
      android.animation.LayoutTransition apply(android.animation.LayoutTransition transition)
      Applies the applicable attributes of the template to a given layout transition, returning that layout transition.

      T      		 apply(T animator)
      Applies the attributes of the template to a given animator, returning that animator.

      Creates and returns a configured ValueAnimator that will transition between the specified array of colors.

      Creates and returns a configured ValueAnimator that will transition between the specified array of rectangles.
      AnimatorTemplate withDuration(long newDuration)
      Returns a new AnimatorTemplate with the specified duration and the called object's interpolator.
      AnimatorTemplate withInterpolator(android.view.animation.Interpolator newInterpolator)

      • DEFAULT

        public static final AnimatorTemplate DEFAULT
        The global default animator template. Uses Anime.DURATION_NORMAL and Anime.INTERPOLATOR_DEFAULT.

      • withDuration

        public AnimatorTemplate withDuration(long newDuration)
        Returns a new AnimatorTemplate with the specified duration and the called object's interpolator.
        Parameters:
        newDuration - The duration for the new template.
        Returns:
        The new template with the updated duration.

      • withInterpolator

        public AnimatorTemplate withInterpolator(android.view.animation.Interpolator newInterpolator)
        Returns a new AnimatorTemplate with the specified interpolator and the called object's duration.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The new template with the updated interpolator.

      • createColorAnimator

        public android.animation.ValueAnimator createColorAnimator(int... colors)
        Creates and returns a configured ValueAnimator that will transition between the specified array of colors.
        Parameters:
        colors - The colors to interpolate between.
        Returns:
        A configured ValueAnimator.

      • createRectAnimator

        public android.animation.ValueAnimator createRectAnimator(android.graphics.Rect... rectangles)
        Creates and returns a configured ValueAnimator that will transition between the specified array of rectangles.
        Parameters:
        rectangles - The rectangles to interpolate between.
        Returns:
        A configured ValueAnimator.
        See Also:
        RectEvaluatorCompat

      • apply

        public <T extends android.animation.Animator> T apply(T animator)
        Applies the attributes of the template to a given animator, returning that animator.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the animator.
        Parameters:
        animator - The animator to apply the template attributes to.
        Returns:
        The animator.

      • apply

        public android.animation.LayoutTransition apply(android.animation.LayoutTransition transition)
        Applies the applicable attributes of the template to a given layout transition, returning that layout transition.

        Does not update the interpolators on the layout transition.

        Parameters:
        transition - The layout transition to apply applicable template attributes to.
        Returns:
        The layout transition.

      • apply

        public android.view.animation.Animation apply(android.view.animation.Animation animation)
        Applies the attributes of the template to a given animation, returning that animation.
        Parameters:
        animation - The Animation to apply template attributes to.
        Returns:
        The animation.
